post.author: 이홍식
post.content: 답변 감사드립니다! 황성규 wrote: > JBuilder를 이용해서 Servlet을 디버깅할수 있는 방법입니다. > > Apache Tomcat Servlet and JavaServer Pages Development with JBuilder Foundation > > http://community.borland.com/article/0,1410,22057,00.html > > 이홍식 wrote: > > Thanks for your tip. > > > > So the "result->..." will be populated on the DOS window, I guess... > > > > Using VAJ is like flying an air plane to me. It's too complicated!! I don't get killed though, when the VAJ crashes on me :-) > > > > Regards, > > B Lee > > > > 이성기 wrote: > > > > > > If you are using VAJ, you can do tracking with breakpoint at the line of servlet code. Another way is to insert > > > System.out.println("result -> " + username) between lines. > > > There is no special debugging method for servlet because servlet is a java code. > > > > > > If you want to debug your JSP in VAJ, you can turn on JSP monitor in your Websphere Test Environment dialog box. > > > > > > Scott Lee
post.title: RE: RE: RE: RE: Servlet Debugging?
